title: n8n Workflow Specialist - Join Our Automation Journey!
job_overview:
Love building automations that just work? We're looking for an n8n enthusiast to help us connect our tools and streamline our processes!

What You'll Do

• Build and maintain n8n workflows that connect our various SaaS platforms
• Create automations for tasks like data syncing, notifications, and report generation  
• Test workflows to ensure they run smoothly and reliably
• Document your workflows so the team understands how they work
• Collaborate with us to identify new automation opportunities
• Monitor existing workflows and fix any issues that pop up

What We're Looking For

• n8n Experience - You've built real workflows and understand how n8n works
• JavaScript Basics - Comfortable writing simple code snippets when needed
• SaaS Platform Knowledge - Experience connecting popular tools like Slack, Google Sheets, Airtable, HubSpot, etc. using n8n's built-in nodes
• Problem-Solving Skills - You enjoy figuring out how to make different systems talk to each other
• Clear Communication - You can explain what your workflows do in simple terms

Don't worry about complex API knowledge or database expertise - we'll support you with the technical deep-dives when needed. We just need someone who loves building workflows!

Perfect If You

• Get excited about automation possibilities
• Have a knack for spotting repetitive tasks that could be automated
• Enjoy tinkering with workflows until they're just right
• Like helping teams work more efficiently

How to Apply

Send us:
• Your resume highlighting your n8n experience
• 2-3 examples of workflows you've built (screenshots or descriptions work!)
• A quick note about which SaaS tools you've connected with n8n
• Your favorite automation win - what did it do and why was it awesome?

Ready to automate with us? We can't wait to see what you've built!
